column11:
Seven Seven is an Information Technology and Business Process Management (IT-BPM) outsourcing company that caters to the world’s leaders in the financial services, insurance, investment banking, fast-moving consumer goods, healthcare and telecommunication industries in the United States and Asia Pacific. 

Seven Seven was founded in the United States in 1996. Since then, Seven Seven has continuously expanded its global footprint – starting with the establishment of its delivery center in the Philippines in 1999 and followed by the recent establishment of its offices in  Singapore and Japan.
column13:
1. Internship Program
2. Career Development Program (Career Opportunity for Fresh Graduates)

column4: ChE, CE, CoE, CS, EE, ECE, IE, MatE, ME
column9: Kindly contact Samuel John for Ms. Patron
column11:
Shell is an international energy company that aims to meet the world’s growing need for more and cleaner energy solutions in ways that are economically, environmentally and socially responsible.

Our strategy is to strengthen our position as a leading energy company by providing oil and gas and low-carbon energy as the world’s energy system changes. Safety and social responsibility are fundamental to our business approach.
column13:
1. Graduate Programme
2. Internship Programs (per need basis)
3. Early Careers roles (you may find details here: https://jobs.shell.com/search-jobs/Philippines/25244/2/1694008/13/122/50/2) - Engineer (Reliability PACO), Associate Engineer (Project Services, Reliability Static, CMMS)
column14:
Shell Talent Community (PH): shell.avature.net/Philippines
FB: facebook.com/shellphofficial
Tiktok: @shell.philippines

column11: Huawei is an information and communications technology (ICT) solutions provider. Through our dedication to customer-centric innovation and strong partnerships, we have established end-to-end advantages in telecom networks, devices and cloud computing. We are committed to creating maximum value for telecom operators, enterprises, and consumers by providing competitive solutions and services.
column13:
1. Solutions Engineer
2. Wireless Product Engineer
3. Procurement Engineer
4. Sales Management Assistant
